### âœ… Contributor's Checklist

<!--
Please go through this checklist and tick the boxes. This is the most important part of your PR.
-->
- [ ] I have read and agree to the project's `CONTRIBUTING.md` guidelines.
- [ ] My code follows the code style of this project.
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally, and they work as expected.
- [ ] I have added or updated the necessary documentation (e.g., the model's `README.md`).

#### For New Model Submissions Only:
- [ ] The model weights have been uploaded to a public Hugging Face Hub repository.
- [ ] The directory structure follows the `models/domain/model-name/` format.
- [ ] The submission includes a `detector.py` (or similar) with a clean, reusable class for inference.
- [ ] The submission includes an `example_usage.py` script demonstrating how to use the model.
- [ ] The model's `README.md` is complete, including performance metrics (mAP), dataset information, and class labels.
